plus que de raison

  1. (literary) more than is reasonable, too much, excessively
    dépenser plus que de raison ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)
    manger plus que de raison ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)
trans: more than is reasonable, too much, excessively

title: plus que de raison
